FileReaderReadAsBinaryString.summary:
The readAsBinaryString method is used to start reading the contents of the
specified or . When the read operation is
finished, the becomes
DONE, and the is triggered. At that time, the
attribute contains the raw binary data from
the file.

remarks.para:
Note that this method was once removed from the File API specification, but
re-introduced for backward compatibility.
Using is recommended.
